titles.title: A bill to designate the Department of Veterans Affairs outpatient clinic in Havre, Montana, as the Merril Lundman Department of Veterans Affairs Outpatient Clinic.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S342)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
1/13/2009--Introduced.
Designates the Department of Veterans Affairs outpatient clinic in Havre, Montana, as the "Merril Lundman Department of Veterans Affairs Outpatient Clinic."
